movie.title: Evan Almighty
movie.plot: Junior congressman Evan Baxter, whose wish is to "change the world" is heard by none other than God. When God appears with the perplexing request to build an ark, Evan is sure he is losing it.

events.title: a broken dam causes flooding after heavy rains
